title: Radhe Syam Refeitorio
description: Hare Krishna restaurant in the intersection of the very traditional Vila Isabel, Maracana and Tijuca villages. Possibly named or associated with Missão Prabhupada Vani. Near the campus of Rio de Janeiro State University (UERJ) and Pedro Ernesto Hospital. A la carte with more than half of vegan dishes. Dishes including dairy are marked. Holds Hare Krishna celebrations Saturday nights, some of them mixed with food serving. Holds Indian cuisine courses. Front door discretely signalized as a restaurante and HK temple, with small banner.
